{"step_by_step_thinking": "Omaveloxolone is a synthetic oleanane triterpenoid compound that has antioxidative and anti-inflammatory activities. It is currently under clinical investigation for a variety of indications. The mechanism of action of omaveloxolone is through a combination of activation of the antioxidative transcription factor Nrf2 and inhibition of the pro-inflammatory transcription factor NF-κB. Therefore, omaveloxolone is not an activator of NFkB, but an inhibitor.", "answer_choice": "B"}
